awd_abstract_narration: This project is concerned with research in algebraic                       K-theory. The principal investigator will verify the special                    lambda-ring identities for the general lambda operations which                  have recently been defined. Work will also be done on equations                 among modular forms of weight one and generalizations to                        K-theory.                                                                            This project is in the general area of algebraic K-theory.                 K-theory concerns the evolution of ideas of vector space,                       basis, linear mapping and general linear group to a context                     where the scalars are from a commutative or noncommutative                      ring. In this context, K-theory can be utilized in algebraic                    geometry and other mathematical models involving coefficients                   from rings.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
